title: Cloud Native Maturity Matrix
description: Assess your organization's cloud native maturity across multiple dimensions including culture, architecture, delivery, and operations.

dimensions.title: Culture
dimensions.description: Organizational mindset and approach to change, learning, and collaboration

dimensions.title: Product Management
dimensions.description: How products are planned, developed, and managed throughout their lifecycle

dimensions.title: Delivery
dimensions.description: Methods and practices for delivering software to production

dimensions.title: Architecture
dimensions.description: System design patterns and architectural approaches

maturityLevels.name: No Process
maturityLevels.description: Ad-hoc, individual-driven approaches with minimal standardization

maturityLevels.name: Waterfall
maturityLevels.description: Traditional, sequential approaches with predictable but rigid processes

maturityLevels.name: Agile
maturityLevels.description: Iterative development with increased flexibility and faster feedback cycles

maturityLevels.name: Cloud Native
maturityLevels.description: Distributed, resilient systems optimized for cloud environments

maturityLevels.name: Next
maturityLevels.description: Advanced, self-organizing systems with AI-driven optimization

culture.no-process: Individualist - Work in silos, ad-hoc decision making
culture.waterfall: Predictive - Top-down management, risk-averse, blame culture
culture.cloud-native: Experimental - Data-driven decisions, fast failure recovery
culture.next: Self-Organized - Autonomous teams, continuous learning, innovation focus

product-management.no-process: Projects - Feature-driven, no customer feedback loops
product-management.waterfall: Long-term plan - Annual planning cycles, limited customer input
product-management.agile: Feature driven - Sprint-based delivery, regular customer interaction
product-management.cloud-native: Data driven - Hypothesis-driven development, A/B testing
product-management.next: AI driven - Machine learning insights, predictive customer needs

delivery.waterfall: Scheduled releases - Quarterly or annual releases
delivery.agile: Feature driven - Sprint-based releases, some automation
delivery.cloud-native: Continuous deployment - Automated pipelines, daily releases
delivery.next: AI driven - Intelligent deployment strategies, self-healing systems

architecture.no-process: Emergent - No planned architecture, technical debt
architecture.waterfall: Tightly coupled - Monolithic architecture, shared databases
architecture.agile: Client server - Service-oriented architecture, API layers
architecture.next: Functions - Serverless, event mesh, self-adapting systems

infrastructure.no-process: Single server - Physical servers, manual management
infrastructure.waterfall: Multiple servers - Virtual machines, basic clustering
infrastructure.agile: VMs in cloud - Cloud adoption, auto-scaling groups
infrastructure.cloud-native: Containers - Kubernetes, service mesh, cloud-native services
infrastructure.next: Serverless - Function-as-a-service, edge computing, AI optimization

recommendations.title: Foundation Building
recommendations.description: Focus on establishing basic processes and moving away from ad-hoc approaches.
items: Implement version control for all code and infrastructure

recommendations.title: Agile Transformation
recommendations.description: Mature your agile practices and begin cloud adoption.

recommendations.title: Cloud Native Adoption
recommendations.description: Embrace cloud native patterns and microservices architecture.

recommendations.title: Future-Ready Organization
recommendations.description: Leverage AI and automation for next-generation capabilities.
